The Sorting Hat



The kids were all sorted by pulling laminated house badges blindfolded from a bag, while wearing the Sorting Hat. Here Aaron takes his turn.
Taken Sunday, February 26, 2006, 02:59:27PM. Original image size: 2048x3072, 1.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/40s @ F3.2, ISO 400, 50mm/F1.4 (80mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 4800:5, 1:0:50:50:0:25:45
